articles.title: France's Macron urges voters to join and say no to extremes - BBC.com
articles.description: Days after the far-right National Rally wins European elections, Mr Macron appeals for popular support.
articles.content:
French President Emmanuel Macron has defended his shock decision to dissolve parliament and call elections, urging French voters to come together and "say no to the extremes".
Three days after his b… [+2897 chars]
